Duterte approved additional 4 million beneficiaries of emergency cash aid --Roque tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736402 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736402/duterte-approved-additional-4-million-beneficiaries-of-emergency-cash-aid-roque/story/ "Dati 18 million lang dapat ang pagbibigyan, naging desisyon ni Presidente lahat po ng nangangailangan dapat bigyan. So nadagdagan pa po 'yang 18 million na 'yan ng kung di ako nagkakamali, something like 4 million pa," Palace spokesperson Harry Roque said in an interview on GMA News' Unang Balita. Fri, 01 May 2020 09:32:08 +0800
GSIS hikes emergency loan to members to P40k amid COVID-19 crisis tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736401 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736401/gsis-hikes-emergency-loan-to-members-to-p40k-amid-covid-19-crisis/story/ “P40,000 na po ang mauutang ng ating mga miyembro, and this has been in effect two days ago. Puwede no sila mag apply. Punta lang po sila sa aming kiosk o sa website na www.gsis.gov.ph,” GSIS President and General Manager Rolando Macasaet told Dobol B sa News TV in an interview.“Kung nakautang na po sila noong P20,000, puwede po sila mag-apply ulit para maging P40,000,” he added. Fri, 01 May 2020 09:29:21 +0800
Jeepney drivers association asks gov't to allow them to resume operations tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736400 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736400/jeepney-drivers-association-asks-gov-t-to-allow-them-to-resume-operations/story/ A jeepney drivers association in Manila on Friday asked the government to allow them to resume plying their routes. Fri, 01 May 2020 09:08:49 +0800
Floating market serves residents of remote barangay in Apalit amid ECQ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736399 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/736399/floating-market-serves-residents-of-remote-barangay-in-apalit-amid-ecq/story/ Residents of remote Barangay Capalangan in Apalit, Pampanga need not travel far to the town's public market to buy their basic food needs --floating market has it all for them. Fri, 01 May 2020 08:59:43 +0800
Manila City health workers who die due to COVID-19 to get P1-M benefit tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736398 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736398/manila-city-health-workers-who-die-due-to-covid-19-to-get-p1-m-benefit/story/ On April 30, Mayor Isko Moreno inked Ordinance No. 8639 or the Bagong Bayani Endowment Benefit Ordinance of 2020 where personnel from the Manila Health Department (MHD) or from district hospitals operated by the city government shall receive the benefits should they succumb to the disease. Fri, 01 May 2020 08:58:07 +0800
DILG chief Año orders creation of OFW desks to assist repatriates tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736395 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736395/dilg-chief-ano-orders-creation-of-ofw-desks-to-assist-repatriates/story/ The Department of the Interior and Local Government (DILG) has directed its regional offices to establish desks to cater to the needs of returning OFWs amid the COVID pandemic. Fri, 01 May 2020 08:32:17 +0800
LRT, MRT to allow only 160 passengers per train set once ECQ is lifted -- DOTr exec tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736393 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736393/lrt-mrt-to-allow-only-160-passengers-per-train-set-once-ecq-is-lifted-dotr-exec/story/ A limited number of passengers will be allowed to ride the Light Rail Transit (LRT) and Metro Rail Transit (MRT) systems once the enhanced community quarantine in Metro Manila is lifted, according to the Department of Transportation on Friday. Fri, 01 May 2020 08:12:49 +0800
Pasong Tamo residents in QC up early to claim cash aid tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736389 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736389/pasong-tamo-residents-in-qc-up-early-to-claim-cash-aid/story/ Residents of Pasong Tamo in Quezon City qualified to receive government aid under the Social Amelioration Program were up early Friday, the first day of the extension period for the distribution. Fri, 01 May 2020 07:19:31 +0800
Trump says evidence ties virus to Wuhan lab, threatens tariffs tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736386 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736386/trump-says-evidence-ties-virus-to-wuhan-lab-threatens-tariffs/story/ US President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened new tariffs against Beijing after claiming there is evidence linking the coronavirus to a lab in China's ground-zero city of Wuhan. Trump confident coronavirus may have originated in Chinese lab tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736385 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736385/trump-confident-coronavirus-may-have-originated-in-chinese-lab/story/ US President Donald Trump said on Thursday he was confident the coronavirus may have originated in a Chinese virology lab, but declined to describe the evidence, ratcheting up tensions with Beijing over the origins of the deadly disease. Fri, 01 May 2020 06:41:20 +0800
Brazil's President: WHO encourages kids to be gay tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736384 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736384/brazil-s-president-who-encourages-kids-to-be-gay/story/ Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro said the World Health Organization encourages homosexuality and masturbation among young children, his latest clash with an organization whose advice on social distancing and other anti-coronavirus measures he has repeatedly questioned. Fri, 01 May 2020 06:22:41 +0800
Global COVID-19 death toll surpasses 230,000 mark, cases rise to 3.2M tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736383 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736383/global-covid-19-death-toll-surpasses-230-000-mark-cases-rise-to-3-2m/story/ At least 230,309 people have died worldwide, since the epidemic surfaced in China in December, according to an AFP tally based on official sources. More than 3,218,410 cases have now been reported in 195 countries and territories. Fri, 01 May 2020 05:52:02 +0800
About half of US states easing coronavirus restrictions as jobless numbers grow tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736382 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736382/about-half-of-us-states-easing-coronavirus-restrictions-as-jobless-numbers-grow/story/ With initial White House social-distancing guidelines expiring on Thursday, about half the US states were pressing ahead with plans to ease restrictions on businesses and social life, aiming to revive economies stalled by coronavirus while keeping people safe. Fri, 01 May 2020 05:01:54 +0800
Italy's daily tallies of coronavirus deaths and cases fall tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736378 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736378/italy-s-daily-tallies-of-coronavirus-deaths-and-cases-fall/story/ Deaths from the COVID-19 epidemic in Italy climbed by 285 on Thursday, against 323 the day before, the Civil Protection Agency said, while the daily tally of new infections stood at 1,872, down from 2,086 on Wednesday. Fri, 01 May 2020 03:25:40 +0800
Russian Prime Minister says he has COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736376 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736376/russian-prime-minister-says-he-has-covid-19/story/ Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin on Thursday said he tested positive for coronavirus and will self-isolate to protect other cabinet members.
